name: Picture Perfect (Lambent Studio)
description:
When you get marooned on an island, make your way through a mysterious cave to recover your camera.

Picture Perfect was made for the Secret Santa jam in 2020. It took me just over a month to make.

Controls: WASD to move, ESC to pause, Space to jump, and Mouse 0 (left click) to dash. You can dash in any direction (W + Dash = dash up, S + Dash = dash down).
